scripts.start: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && npx @electron/rebuild -f -w node-pty && electron .
scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:jest: npm run test:jest:prod -- --silent --verbose=false --noStackTrace --passWithNoTests --reporters=default && npm run test:jest:mock -- --silent --verbose=false --noStackTrace --passWithNoTests --reporters=default
scripts.test:jest:prod: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && jest --config=jest.config.js
scripts.test:jest:mock: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && jest --config=jest.config.mock.js
scripts.test:jest:prod:coverage: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && jest --config=jest.config.js --coverage --coverageDirectory=coverage/prod
scripts.test:jest:mock:coverage: unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && jest --config=jest.config.mock.js --coverage --coverageDirectory=coverage/mock
scripts.coverage:prepare: mkdir -p coverage/merged-raw && cp coverage/prod/coverage-final.json coverage/merged-raw/prod.json && cp coverage/mock/coverage-final.json coverage/merged-raw/mock.json
scripts.test:jest:coverage:base: npm run test:jest:prod:coverage && npm run test:jest:mock:coverage && npm run coverage:prepare && nyc merge coverage/merged-raw coverage/merged/coverage.json
scripts.test:jest:coverage:html: npm run test:jest:coverage:base && nyc report --reporter=html-spa --report-dir=coverage/merged --temp-dir=coverage/merged && open coverage/merged/index.html
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && E2E_ENV=prod npx playwright test --reporter=list
scripts.test:e2e:report: npm run build && unset PREFIX && source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && E2E_ENV=prod npx playwright test
